description: Heckenlights is the christmas light installation in Heckenpfad, Weinheim Germany. Take control over Heckenlights using your MIDI files.
about_takecontrol: Watch. Play music. Take control. Tweet #Heckenlights
about_lead:
Heckenlights is a christmas light installation in Heckenpfad, Weinheim Germany. It play to christmas music and is controlled using MIDI. Heckenlights allows you to control and watch it play. Tweet #Heckenlights and see your messages on the mesagebox. Become your self a program director for Heckenlights using your christmas MIDI music.

Heckenlights start on 17:00 CET Dec. 1st 2014 and will be available until Jan. 6th 2015. Since christmas lights are cool only at night Heckenlights will operate daily between 17:00 CET to 22:00 CET and 5:00 CET to 8:00 CET.
index_captcha: You need to solve the captcha in order to upload MIDIfiles for Heckenlights.
index_intro1: Heckenlights is a christmas lights installation playing christmas songs using lights. You can watch, hear and even submit your own christmas music. Heckenlights is controlled using
index_legal_oss: Heckenlights is a free, non-profit, fun-only and open source project. Heckenlights is made for joy in the christmas time. It is created for you and me.
index_legal_pd: Christmas music, like other copyrighted work, can be either public domain or are copyrighted. I do not want with Heckenlights to infringe any rights held by copyright owners. If you decide to upload christmas songs for playing on Heckenlights, either make sure the works are public domain or you own/can decide over the rights for performing. If you're not sure about public domain so https://songclearance.com or PDInfo are good starting points.
index_legal_contact: Hechenlights played a song you hold copyrights for and you did not grant performance? Please contact me: legal@heckenlights.org
index_hint_delay: Live stream is delayed by 10 to 20 seconds.
index_upload_info: Do you have MIDI files? Upload your christmas tracks to heckenlights.org hoch. Track duration must be between 10 seconds and 5 minutes.
internal_server_error: There was an internal server error, could not validate your request.
captcha_validation_error: Validation not successful. Please enter the displayed words/numbers.

enqueue_tweet_now: Uploaded __track__ at http://heckenlights.org. Come, hear and see it now. #Heckenlights
